verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah Jesus is alive Death has lost its victory And the grave has been denied Jesus lives forever He’s alive, He’s alive.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s the Alpha and Omega The first and last is He The curse of sin is broken And we have perfect liberty The Lamb of God is risen He’s alive, He’s alive.{/lang-eng}
